io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.service

Interface NucleusHomeService


  • public interface NucleusHomeService
    Provides information about user homes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_HOME_NAME
      The default home name.
      static Pattern HOME_NAME_PATTERN
      The pattern that all home names must follow.

      • getHome

        Optional<Home> getHome(UUID user,
                       String name)
        Gets a specified home of the user, if it exists.

        name - The name of the home.
        Returns:
        The Home, if it exists.

      • getHome

        default Optional<Home> getHome(User user,
                               String name)

      • createHome

        void createHome(Cause cause,
                User user,
                String name,
                Location<World> location,
                Vector3d rotation)
         throws NucleusException
        Creates a home. This is subject to Nucleus' standard checks.

        Home names must follow the regex defined by HOME_NAME_PATTERN.

        Parameters:
        cause - The Cause of the change. The PluginContainer must be the root cause.
        user - The UUID of the user to create the home for.
        name - The name of the home to create.
        location - The location of the home.
        rotation - The rotation of the player when they return to this home.
        Throws:
        NucleusException - if the home could not be created, due to home limits, or a plugin cancelled the event.

      • createHome

        default void createHome(Cause cause,
                        UUID user,
                        String name,
                        Location<World> location,
                        Vector3d rotation)
                 throws NucleusException,
                        NoSuchPlayerException
        Throws:
        NucleusException
        NoSuchPlayerException

      • modifyHome

        default void modifyHome(Cause cause,
                        UUID user,
                        String name,
                        Location<World> location,
                        Vector3d rotation)
                 throws NucleusException
        Modifies a home's location.
        Parameters:
        cause - The Cause of the change. The PluginContainer must be the root cause.
        user - The UUID of the user to modify the home for.
        name - The name of the home to modify.
        location - The location of the home.
        rotation - The rotation of the player when they return to this home.
        Throws:
        NucleusException - if the home could not be found, or a plugin cancelled the event.

      • modifyHome

        void modifyHome(Cause cause,
                Home home,
                Location<World> location,
                Vector3d rotation)
         throws NucleusException
        Modifies a home's location.
        Parameters:
        cause - The Cause of the change. The PluginContainer must be the root cause.
        home - The Home to modify.
        location - The location of the home.
        rotation - The rotation of the player when they return to this home.
        Throws:
        NucleusException - if the home could not be found, or a plugin cancelled the event.

      • modifyOrCreateHome

        default void modifyOrCreateHome(Cause cause,
                                User user,
                                String name,
                                Location<World> location,
                                Vector3d rotation)
                         throws NucleusException
        Modifies a home's location, if it exists, otherwise creates a home. This is subject to Nucleus' standard checks.
        Parameters:
        cause - The Cause of the change. The PluginContainer must be the root cause.
        user - The UUID of the user to modify the home for.
        name - The name of the home to modify or create.
        location - The location of the home.
        rotation - The rotation of the player when they return to this home.
        Throws:
        NucleusException - if the home could not be created, due to home limits, or a plugin cancelled the event.

      • modifyOrCreateHome

        default void modifyOrCreateHome(Cause cause,
                                UUID user,
                                String name,
                                Location<World> location,
                                Vector3d rotation)
                         throws NucleusException,
                                NoSuchPlayerException
        Modifies a home's location, if it exists, otherwise creates a home. This is subject to Nucleus' standard checks.
        Parameters:
        cause - The Cause of the change. The PluginContainer must be the root cause.
        user - The UUID of the user to modify the home for.
        name - The name of the home to modify or create.
        location - The location of the home.
        rotation - The rotation of the player when they return to this home.
        Throws:
        NucleusException - if the home could not be created, due to home limits, or a plugin cancelled the event.
        NoSuchPlayerException - if the supplied UUID does not map to a known user

      • removeHome

        default void removeHome(Cause cause,
                        UUID user,
                        String name)
                 throws NucleusException
        Removes a home.
        Parameters:
        cause - The Cause of the change. The PluginContainer must be the root cause.
        user - The UUID of the user to remove the home of.
        name - The name of the home to remove.
        Throws:
        NucleusException - if the home could not be found, or a plugin cancelled the event.

      • removeHome

        void removeHome(Cause cause,
                Home home)
         throws NucleusException
        Removes a home.
        Parameters:
        cause - The Cause of the change. The PluginContainer must be the root cause.
        home - The Home to remove.
        Throws:
        NucleusException - if the home could not be found, or a plugin cancelled the event.

      • getMaximumHomes

        int getMaximumHomes(UUID uuid)
             throws IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the maximum number of homes the player can have.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player.
        Returns:
        The number of homes, or Integer.MAX_VALUE if unlimited.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the user cannot be found

      • getMaximumHomes

        int getMaximumHomes(User user)
        Returns the maximum number of homes the player can have.
        Parameters:
        user - The User.
        Returns:
        The number of homes, or Integer.MAX_VALUE if unlimited.
